name: finetunes
tag_list: digital-distributor, marketing-solutions, daily-sales-stats, promotion-tool, direct-to-fan, white-label-shop-provider, shop, digital-service-provider, encoding, digital-logistics, hosting
overview:
finetunes is a digital distributor founded in 2004 which offers a wide range of marketing and promotion services.

finetunes delivers the content of its label partners to every major internet and mobile platform. Further to this distribution, finetunes provides the services of a digital sales team who work to develop and implement a co-ordinated and international marketing strategy for our releases. By working closely with our retail partners, our sales and marketing team aims to achieve the best possible promotional placement for our labelsâ€™ releases on digital stores around the world.

finetunes offers our label partners with many more possibilities for promoting their releases effectively through the internet. We provide a promotion platform called the ‘finetunes PromoTool’ (http://promotool.finetunes.net) for content managers of shops, webradios, blogs and communities. Voucher campaigns and partner banners on numerous webpages.

The technical side of finetunesâ€™ operations works to process audio content and metadata for accurate and fast distribution via the internet. We supply audio content in all the formats required by partners â€“ including MP3, OGG, AAC, ATRAC, WMA etc. We also supply metadata which includes crucial release information such as artist, trackname, barcodes, details of rights owners, artwork and release descriptions. Our metadata also contains specific and highly-adjustable right information â€“ enabling detailed territory and store mapping, as well as allowing for DRM-arrangements. All this information is compiled using finetunesâ€™ self-developed mass-encoding software.

finetunes also offers complete whitelabel-shop solutions for artists, labels, companies and portals. The licensee of the shop-technology has access to the whole of finetunesâ€™ distribution content, as well as access to content from other labels (both majors and indies), and online distributors. Shop technology, hosting, payment and mechanical royalty (GEMA) payments are completely handled by our in-house developed software solution.
